derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French égalitaire, from égal 'equal', from Latin aequalis (see equal)

entry.tran: 主张人人平等的;平等主义的
entry.def: Egalitarian means supporting or following the idea that all people are equal and should have the same rights and opportunities.
